verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֥א <S%H4853><s%> The burden דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> of the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> to Israel בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> by מַלְאָכִֽי׃ <S%H4401><s%> Malachi

אָהַ֤בְתִּי <S%H157><s%> I have loved אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Yet ye say יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H559><s%> say בַּמָּ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> How אֲהַבְתָּ֑נוּ <S%H157><s%> Wherein hast thou loved הֲלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָ֨ח <S%H251><s%> another עֵשָׂ֤ו <S%H6215><s%> us? [Was] not Esau לְיַֽעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> Jacob's נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> you saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וָאֹהַ֖ב <S%H157><s%> yet I loved אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> Jacob

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau שָׂנֵ֑אתִי <S%H8130><s%> And I hated וָאָשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> and laid אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָיו֙ <S%H2022><s%> his mountains שְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> waste וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלָת֖וֹ <S%H5159><s%> and his heritage לְתַנּ֥וֹת <S%H8568><s%> for the dragons מִדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Though תֹאמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> saith אֱד֜וֹם <S%H123><s%> Whereas Edom רֻשַּׁ֗שְׁנוּ <S%H7567><s%> We are impoverished וְנָשׁוּב֙ <S%H7725><s%> but we will return וְנִבְנֶ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> and build חֳרָב֔וֹת <S%H2723><s%> the desolate places כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They יִבְנ֖וּ <S%H1129><s%> They shall build וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I אֶהֱר֑וֹס <S%H2040><s%> but I will throw down וְקָרְא֤וּ <S%H7121><s%> and they shall call לָהֶם֙ גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> them The border רִשְׁעָ֔ה <S%H7564><s%> of wickedness וְהָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> and The people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom זָעַ֥ם <S%H2194><s%> hath indignation יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> against whom the LORD עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

וְעֵינֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> And your eyes תִּרְאֶ֑ינָה <S%H7200><s%> shall see וְאַתֶּ֤ם <S%H859><s%> and you תֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and ye shall say יִגְדַּ֣ל <S%H1431><s%> will be magnified יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and לִגְב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> from the border יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

בֵּ֛ן <S%H1121><s%> A son יְכַבֵּ֥ד <S%H3513><s%> honoureth אָ֖ב <S%H1><s%> [his] father וְעֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> and a servant אֲדֹנָ֑יו <S%H113><s%> his master וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אָ֣ב <S%H1><s%> if then I [be] a father אָ֣נִי <S%H589><s%> I אַיֵּ֣ה <S%H346><s%> where כְבוֹדִ֡י <S%H3519><s%> glorious וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אֲדוֹנִ֣ים <S%H113><s%> master אָנִי֩ <S%H589><s%> I אַיֵּ֨ה <S%H346><s%> where מוֹרָאִ֜י <S%H4172><s%> dread אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> And ye say יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts לָכֶם֙ הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> unto you O priests בּוֹזֵ֣י <S%H959><s%> that despise שְׁמִ֔י <S%H8034><s%> my name וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <S%H559><s%> say בַּמֶּ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> How בָזִ֖ינוּ <S%H959><s%> Wherein have we despised אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> my name

מַגִּישִׁ֤ים <S%H5066><s%> Ye offer עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon מִזְבְּחִי֙ <S%H4196><s%> upon mine altar לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread מְגֹאָ֔ל <S%H1351><s%> polluted וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H559><s%> and ye say בַּמֶּ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> How גֵֽאַלְנ֑וּךָ <S%H1351><s%> Wherein have we polluted בֶּאֱמָרְכֶ֕ם <S%H559><s%> thee? In that ye say שֻׁלְחַ֥ן <S%H7979><s%> The table יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נִבְזֶ֥ה <S%H959><s%> [is] contemptible הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when תַגִּשׁ֨וּן <S%H5066><s%> And if ye offer עִוֵּ֤ר <S%H5787><s%> the blind לִזְבֹּ֙חַ֙ <S%H2076><s%> for sacrifice אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> else רָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> adversity וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> when תַגִּ֛ישׁוּ <S%H5066><s%> present פִּסֵּ֥חַ <S%H6455><s%> the lame וְחֹלֶ֖ה <S%H2470><s%> and sick אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> else רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> adversity הַקְרִיבֵ֨הוּ <S%H7126><s%> approach נָ֜א <S%H4994><s%> thy לְפֶחָתֶ֗ךָ <S%H6346><s%> it now unto thy governor הֲיִרְצְךָ֙ <S%H7521><s%> will he be pleased א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> Or הֲיִשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> with thee or accept פָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> accept אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> answer יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> now חַלּוּ־ <S%H2470><s%> entreat נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> I beseech thee פְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> favor אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> God וִֽיחָנֵ֑נוּ <S%H2603><s%> that he will be gracious מִיֶּדְכֶם֙ <S%H3027><s%> unto us this hath been by your means הָ֣יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> become זֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> will he הֲיִשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> will he regard מִכֶּם֙ <S%H4480><s%> any פָּנִ֔ים <S%H6440><s%> favor אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> answer יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Oh גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> again בָּכֶם֙ וְיִסְגֹּ֣ר <S%H5462><s%> Who [is there] even among you that would shut דְּלָתַ֔יִם <S%H1817><s%> the doors וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תָאִ֥ירוּ <S%H215><s%> [for nought]? neither do ye kindle מִזְבְּחִ֖י <S%H4196><s%> [fire] on mine altar חִנָּ֑ם <S%H2600><s%> for nought אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> else לִ֨י חֵ֜פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> I have no pleasure בָּכֶ֗ם אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> in you saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וּמִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> an offering לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor אֶרְצֶ֥ה <S%H7521><s%> neither will I accept מִיֶּדְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> at your hand

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> from מִמִּזְרַח־ <S%H4217><s%> For from the rising שֶׁ֜מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> of the sun וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even מְבוֹא֗וֹ <S%H3996><s%> even unto the going down גָּד֤וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [shall be] great שְׁמִי֙ <S%H8034><s%> of the same my name בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> among the Gentiles וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מָק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> and in every place מֻקְטָ֥ר <S%H6999><s%> incense מֻגָּ֛שׁ <S%H5066><s%> [shall be] offered לִשְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> unto my name וּמִנְחָ֣ה <S%H4503><s%> offering טְהוֹרָ֑ה <S%H2889><s%> and a pure כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָד֤וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [shall be] great שְׁמִי֙ <S%H8034><s%> for my name בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you מְחַלְּלִ֣ים <S%H2490><s%> But ye have profaned אוֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> בֶּאֱמָרְכֶ֗ם <S%H559><s%> it in that ye say שֻׁלְחַ֤ן <S%H7979><s%> The table אֲדֹנָי֙ <S%H136><s%> of the Lord מְגֹאָ֣ל <S%H1351><s%> [is] polluted ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְנִיב֖וֹ <S%H5108><s%> and the fruit נִבְזֶ֥ה <S%H959><s%> [is] contemptible אָכְלֽוֹ׃ <S%H400><s%> thereof [even] his meat

וַאֲמַרְתֶּם֩ <S%H559><s%> Ye said הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold מַתְּלָאָ֜ה <S%H4972><s%> also Behold what a weariness וְהִפַּחְתֶּ֣ם <S%H5301><s%> [is it] and ye have snuffed אוֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> at it saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וַהֲבֵאתֶ֣ם <S%H935><s%> and ye brought גָּז֗וּל <S%H1497><s%> [that which was] torn וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפִּסֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H6455><s%> and the lame וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֣חוֹלֶ֔ה <S%H2470><s%> and the sick וַהֲבֵאתֶ֖ם <S%H935><s%> thus ye brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָ֑ה <S%H4503><s%> an offering הַאֶרְצֶ֥ה <S%H7521><s%> should I accept אוֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> מִיֶּדְכֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> able אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> say יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

וְאָר֣וּר <S%H779><s%> But cursed נוֹכֵ֗ל <S%H5230><s%> [be] the deceiver וְיֵ֤שׁ <S%H3426><s%> which בְּעֶדְרוֹ֙ <S%H5739><s%> hath in his flock זָכָ֔ר <S%H2145><s%> a male וְנֹדֵ֛ר <S%H5087><s%> and voweth וְזֹבֵ֥חַ <S%H2076><s%> and sacrificeth מָשְׁחָ֖ת <S%H7843><s%> a corrupt thing לַֽאדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> unto the Lord כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for מֶ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> King גָּד֜וֹל <S%H1419><s%> for I [am] a great אָ֗נִי <S%H589><s%> I אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וּשְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> and my name נוֹרָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> [is] dreadful בַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen
